title: SAP 4b
content:
It's been 2 days and we're at version 4b. Which adds SUPPORT for mobile platforms if compiled for them.

What happened?
Beta Milestones.

I got obsessed with Milestone builds for the windows builds before release and I decided to implement that into Sinco and Portilizen.
So now, at Milestone 5 (Milestone 1 is 0.1b, 2 is 1b) we have all 3 levels I've decided are to stay / be added.
And SUPPORT for mobile platforms. iOS idk, android defenitely.
